document.full_text: a gang kidnapped the great-niece of egypt's former president anwar sadat on her way to school and held her for 21 hours until her father paid a ransom, security sources and state media said monday.
document.title: gang kidnaps great-niece of former egypt president
lines_and_colors: a gang kidnapped the great-niece of egypt's former president anwar sadat on her way to school and held her for 21 hours until her father paid a ransom, security sources and state media said monday.
